question: What is the function of R-spondin 1 and noggin in non-damaged gallbladders?
ideal_answer: R-spondin 1 and noggin facilitate expansion of resident stem cells from non-damaged gallbladders.

snippets.text: R-spondin 1 and noggin facilitate expansion of resident stem cells from non-damaged gallbladders.
R-spondin 1 and noggin facilitate expansion of resident stem cells from non-damaged gallbladders.

exact_answer: The expansion of resident stem cells.
